mapper.sql: id, dis_code, dis_type, dis_value, dis_sort, dis_sys_id, is_delete, add_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from dis_dictionary where dis_code = #{disCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete='N' ORDER BY dis_sort ASC
